form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants or United States Visas, 50157-102

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/24/2023 PLACE MED' L EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS New Delhi : 166, Jorbagh OR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION March 27, 1989 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at New Delhi India NAME AGE SEX Mrs. MOHINDER KAUR 82 F I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON B 1113500 Chandigarh 23 July 87 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Insanity Psychopathic personality Sexual deviation CERTIFY or more MEDICAL THAT Ghobid (Seegits Mental Narcotic TESTS defect drug to sec. THIS appliction BE, FORM GSPHS THE 1 AUT RESERS PURPOSE TOBIZE AND TO ME CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or THE THE AmountingON Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Class C : Full mouth denture Impaired vision, corrected Normal Chest X-ray report D.N. Panjiar from Dr. V.D.R.L : Non-reactive A.Lal Blood serological report from Dr. Antibody to HIV-I : Non-reactive Other special report(s) (when needed) A.Lal from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR ARVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Harish Khosla Harion MBBS, FRCP, FCCP, FNCCP. March 28, 1989 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary, OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1985 0- 465-885 - Dept. of State
